overview: Chris Verdin joined PacketExchange in January 2006. He is a Chartered Accountant with 10 years board-level experience of emerging companies in the UK, EU and US. Immediately prior to joining PacketExchange Chris was CFO at an international firm of headhunters for venture-backed companies in the TMT sectors where he helped establish and grow the US operation of the group and prior to that he was based in Madrid where he managed the public share offering of a leading Spanish internet portal.
